domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category

text: The first test invite I got, I passed and was asked to stay back for an interview same day. I was equally successful and was called to see the CEO which was the last stage of the recruitment process. Maybe my price scared them, I was not called back as promised.
